name: Prenses Music
description: Advanced Telegram Music Bot with Assistant support | Pyrogram v2 | Heroku Deploy Ready

OWNER_ID.description: Bot owner Telegram ID (multiple allowed, comma-separated)

LOG_GROUP_ID.description: Private log group ID (must start with -100)

STRING_SESSION.description: Pyrogram session string for Assistant account

START_MODULE.description: Python main module to run, e.g. BrandrdXMusic

PYROGRAM_UPDATE_WORKAROUND.description: Bypass unknown constructor Telegram update error
